text.title: Chymisticum artificium naturæ, theoricum & practicum : cuius summarium versa pagella clariùs indicabit : liber planè philosophicus, in gratiam omnium veræ philosophiæ naturalis studiosorum æditus / per Gerardum Dorn.

bibliography.title: Chymisticum artificium naturæ, theoricum & practicum : cuius summarium versa pagella clariùs indicabit : liber planè philosophicus, in gratiam omnium veræ philosophiæ naturalis studiosorum æditus / per Gerardum Dorn.
bibliography.note: Library copy from the Winthrop Collection. Bound in vellum, title on spine in ink. Underscorings throughout. Inscriptions on flyleaf and t.p.: 78 in red crayon, No 73 in pencil, No 632 in ink. T.p. includes initials of John Dee in ms. at top and an inscription in his hand at bottom, in Latin, commenting that Dorn used Dee's monas hieroglyphica in the t.p. vignette without permission. Cf. Wilkinson.

Title-vignette; initials. The first of three parts. Parts two and three published Frankfurt, 1569 under title: Artificii chymisti physici, metaphysicique. Cf. LC, Duveen. " The first tract may have been printed at Leyden, see Schmieder (p. 321) ..." --Duveen. Signatures: A-I⁸ K⁶.
